features.additionalInfo: Access using ANZ Internet Banking or ANZ App
ANZ Redraw could let you access extra payments you've made to an eligible loan when you need to. You can easily access your redraw funds via ANZ Internet Banking and other convenient ways.

fees.name: Loan Approval Fee
fees.additionalInfo: $600 payable for approved applications or renewals submitted prior to 19 March 2022. For split loans, $600 is payable for the first loan, $200 for each further loan. These fees are waived for loans under the ANZ Breakfree Package (no longer for sale) and will not be charged if a Renegotiation Fee is charged in respect of the same change. These fees are $0 for approved applications or renewals submitted on or after 19 March 2022. If fee applicable, fee is payable at the time the loan is drawn down, or the date of renewal. Please refer to ANZ Personal Banking General Fees and Charges booklet for further information.

fees.name: Valuation Administration Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable where ANZ needs to order a valuation of any property that has been mortgaged to ANZ as a security for your Loan. Payable for approved applications or renewals submitted prior to 19 March 2022. This fee is waived for loans under the ANZ Breakfree Package (no longer for sale). This fee is $0 for approved applications or renewals submitted on or after 19 March 2022. Refer to the ANZ Personal Banking General Fees and Charges booklet for further information.

fees.name: Guarantee Administration Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable for each guarantee taken by ANZ for the purpose of securing your loan/facility. Payable for approved applications or renewals submitted prior to 19 March 2022. This fee is waived for loans under the ANZ Breakfree Package (no longer for sale). This fee is $0 for approved applications or renewals submitted on or after 19 March 2022. Refer to ANZ Personal Banking General Fees and Charges booklet for further information.

fees.name: Loan Administration Charge
fees.additionalInfo: Loan Administration Fee of $5 is payable monthly in arrears. Payable for approved applications or renewals submitted prior to 19 March 2022. This fee is waived for loans under the ANZ Breakfree Package (no longer for sale). This fee is $0 for approved applications or renewals submitted on or after 19 March 2022. Refer to ANZ Personal Banking General Fees and Charges booklet for further information.

fees.name: Renegotiation Fee (Non Credit Critical)
fees.additionalInfo: If you renegotiate or convert your loan, ANZ may charge a $200 renegotiation fee. Payable for approved applications or renewals submitted prior to 19 March 2022. This fee is waived for loans under the ANZ Breakfree Package (no longer for sale). This fee is $0 for approved applications or renewals submitted on or after 19 March 2022. Refer to ANZ Personal Banking General Fees and Charges booklet for further information.

fees.name: Late Payment Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Charged when a payment remains unpaid for 30 days or more after it is due. A further fee is payable monthly when the loan continues to be in arrears. Refer to ANZ Personal Banking General Fees and Charges booklet for further information.

fees.name: Progress payment fee
fees.additionalInfo: One off fee charged in respect of a loan that is progressively drawn and is payable at the time of the first progress payment drawn down under the loan. Payable for approved applications or renewals submitted prior to 19 March 2022. This fee is waived for loans under the ANZ Breakfree Package (no longer for sale). This fee is $0 for approved applications or renewals submitted on or after 19 March 2022. Refer to ANZ Personal Banking General Fees and Charges booklet for further information.

fees.name: Lodgement Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable for each document that ANZ lodges or registers with any person or authority in respect of your loan or any security provided for your loan, where ANZ is required or entitled to lodge or register that document. This fee is not charged on establishment of your loan. Refer to ANZ Personal Banking General Fees and Charges booklet for further information.

fees.name: Production Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable for each Certificate or Title or other security document ANZ produces at your request, in connection with your loan. Refer to ANZ Personal Banking General Fees and Charges booklet for further information.

fees.name: Settlement Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable each time that ANZ is required to attend a settlement (or attend to an electronic settlement) in relation to any advance made under your Loan, or in relation to any securities provided or varied in respect of your Loan. The fee is payable on the date of the settlement and is not dependent on the settlement being successful. This fee is not charged on establishment of your loan. Refer to ANZ Personal Banking General Fees and Charges booklet for further information.

fees.name: Search Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable each time that ANZ obtains information from governmental or regulatory records in connection with the loan/facility or any security. This fee is not charged on establishment of your loan. Refer to the ANZ Personal Banking General Fees and Charges booklet for further information.

fees.name: Renegotiation Fee (Full Credit Critical)
fees.additionalInfo: A $350 renegotiation fee will be charged in the below scenarios:  - there is a change to the borrowers or guarantors, the term or amount of the loan/facility or the security provided for the loan/facility;   - repayments are changing to interest-only repayments, an interest only period is being extended or there is a change from interest in arrears to interest in advance or vice versa;  - two or more loans are being combined into a single loan;   - a loan is converted to a facility or vice versa;   - a Lenders Mortgage Insurance premium would become payable as a result of the change   Payable for approved applications or renewals submitted prior to 19 March 2022. This fee is waived for loans under the ANZ Breakfree Package (no longer for sale). This fee is $0 for approved applications or renewals submitted on or after 19 March 2022. Please refer to ANZ Personal Banking General Fees and Charges booklet for further information.
